S03n226:1: cittaprasādodgataṃ pātrātiśayapratipāditaṃ ca nālpakaṃ nāma dānamasti vipākamahattvāt |
S03n226:7: tatyāja dṛptānapi tasya śatrūn rakteva reme tadapāśriteṣu |
S03n226:9: dharmātmakatvānna ca nāma tasya paropatāpāśivamāsa cetaḥ |
S03n226:10: bhṛtyānurāgastu tathā jajṛmbhe dviṣatsu lakṣmīrna yathāsya reme ||3 ||
S03n226:12: tadanusmaraṇācca samupajātasaṃvego viśeṣavattaraṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyaḥ sukhahetunidānaṃ dānamadācchīlasaṃvaramanavarataṃ pupoṣa poṣadhaniyamaṃ ca parvadivaseṣu samādade |
S03n226:13: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca rājā parṣadi svasmiṃścāntaḥpure puṇyaprabhāvodbhāvanāllokaṃ śreyasi niyoktukāmaḥ pratītahṛdayo gāthādvayamiti niyatārthaṃ babhāṣe-
S03n226:22: tamamātyā brāhmaṇavṛddhāḥ pauramukhyāśca kautūhalādhūrṇitamanaso'pi na prasahante sma paryanuyoktuṃ kimabhisamīkṣya mahārājo gāthādvayamidamabhīkṣṇaṃ bhāṣata iti |
S03n226:23: atha tasya rājño vāgnityatvādavyāhatatarapraṇayaprasarā devī samutpannakautūhalā saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ parṣadi paryapṛcchadenam |
S03n226:25: bhavati mama kutūhalākulaṃ hṛdayamidaṃ kathitena tena te ||6 ||
S03n226:26: tadarhati śrotumayaṃ jano yadi pracakṣva tatkiṃ nviti bhāṣase nṛpa |
S03n226:27: rahasyamevaṃ ca na kīrtyate kvacitprakāśamasmācca mayāpi pṛcchyate ||7 ||
S03n226:28: atha sa rājā prītyabhisnigdhayā dṛṣṭyā samabhivīkṣya devīṃ smitapravikasitavadana uvāca-
S03n226:32: puraṃ ca sāntaḥpuramatra tena me niśamyatāṃ yena mayaivamucyate ||9 ||
S03n226:46: puṇyena ca labhe tṛptimarhatāṃ darśanena ca ||13 ||
S03n226:47: atha sā devī praharṣavismayaviśālākṣī sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇā rājānamityuvāca |
S03n226:50: tadevameva pāpapravṛttivimukhaḥ piteva prajānāṃ samyakparipālanasumukhaḥ puṇyagaṇārjanābhimukhaḥ |
S03n226:58: atha sa rājā devīṃ devīmiva śriyā jvalantīmabhisnigdhamavekṣya śrīsampattihetukutūhalahṛdayaḥ punaruvāca-
S03n226:62: kathaya kathayedānīmiti ca sādaraṃ rājñā paryanuyuktovāca-
S03n226:69: kṣīṇāsraveṣu na kṛtaṃ tanu nāma kiñci-
S03n226:71: atha sa rājā puṇyaphalapradarśanātpuṇyeṣu samutpāditabahumānāmabhiprasannamanasaṃ parṣadaṃ vismayaikāgrāmavetya niyatamīdṛśaṃ kiñcitsamanuśaśāsa-
S03n226:74: naiva draṣṭumapi kṣamaḥ sa puruṣaḥ paryāptavitto'pi san
S03n226:76: tyaktavyaṃ vivaśena yanna ca tathā kasmaicidarthāya yat
S03n226:78: ko'sau tatra bhajeta matsarapathaṃ jānanguṇānāṃ rasaṃ
S03n226:87: diti parigaṇitārthaḥ ko na dānāni dadyāt ||22 ||
S03n226:90: atha sā parṣattasya rājñastadgrāhakaṃ vacanaṃ sabahumānamabhinandya pradānādipratipattyabhimukhī babhūva |
S03n226:91: tadevaṃ cittaprasādodgataṃ pātrātiśayapratipāditaṃ ca nālpakaṃ nāma dānamasti vipākamahattvāditi prasannacittenānuttare puṇyakṣetra āryasaṃghe dānaṃ dadatā parā prītirutpādayitavyā |
S03n226:92: adūre mamāpyevaṃvidhā ato viśiṣṭatarāśca sampattaya iti |
